promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a chibi cute basic frilled-lizard fire-type pokemon wearing ruby gemstones. It can be found in volcano-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, fire or frilled-lizard. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Rubygazer, a a chibi cute basic frilled-lizard fire-type pokemon. It can be found in volcano-like environments It has the following abilities: Fireblast, Delta Crush. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "frilled-lizard", "fire" or "Rubygazer". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fire-type pokemon, frilled-lizard-like, basic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, red and purple ambient lighting
generatedDescription: Despite its miniature stature, don't underestimate Rubygazer. It thrives in heated terrains, showcasing Delta Crush and Fireblast amidst volcanic chaos.
